monster.name: Fungal Leonin

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Fungal Leonin makes 2 Fungal Blade attacks and one Infecting bite attack

action.name: Fungal Baldes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage, plus 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Infecting Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, plus 17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) necrotic damage.
The target must make a constitution saving thow ({@dc 18}) or get infected.

bonusHeader: The Fungal Leonin can use its Bonus Action to command or damage all infected creatures in a 1mile radius.

bonus.name: Command
entries: The Fungal Leonin commands an infected creature to use an action as he chooses. The targets must make a Wisdom saving throw({@dc 14}) or give into the commands.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The fungal Leonin makes a fungal blade attack

legendary.name: Mushroom Gas (Cost 2 actions)
entries: The fungal leonin expells a thick gas das heaviliy obscures the area in a 30 feet radius
